overview: Pushpendra Singh is working with professional and reputed IT Company that is MetaDesign Solutions. Pushpendra Singh is working as digital marketing executive in it. MetaDesign Solutions, a complete IT solution provider mainly in business of software development, mobile development, InDesign developmnet, game developmnet, multimedia and web solutions. The company was formed in November 2006 and maintained a phenomenal growth over the years. MetaDesign Solutions achieved total financial stability since inception and grown solely based on internally generated funds.

external_links.title: Offshore Software Consulting and Development Company India
